title: There are a looooooooooooot of people complaining about placements man
body:
If you ended in "x" rank last season and dropped to "x" rank this season even after winning 73 out of your 10 provisional games, I'm sure you'll have no sweat rising back up to whatever rank you were last season or even higher since the new ranked dynamic queue and champ select partnered with the promo helper makes climbing just that much easier. 

Also, hasn't MMR and placements always been judged on your in game stats as well as just winning or losing? I might be wrong but I've gone on loss streaks before but still had great LP gain since I was still doing well in game

EDIT: I just finished my provisionals, won 7-3 and got placed in Bronze 2 when I ended in I think Silver 3 last season. No complaints, it's all g, I'll climb. MAYBE even to Gold this season, I feel confident enough

replies.body: In game stats have literally no affect on mmr/rank where did you hear such bullsht lmfao.
Oh lol I can't remember where I heard it from but I did hear it.
I like you. About time someone posted this. I fell 3 divisions but I've already Climbed back 2.
I'm not looking for anything serious xo Janna xo....
What about something fast, dirty, and casual?

Had good KDA in 9/10 never went negative and had good CS went 3 wins and 7 looses cause of AFK Feeders or people who think its funny to throw now I'm in bronze. I know its easy to climb back to where you were but thats not the point. It's the principle If you said its about how good u are in game not rly whether its a lost or win than pls explain it in my situation
Man, it's a ranked RESET. Riot aren't gonna place you above where you were last season, otherwise it wouldn't be a reset. They wanna make sure you actually deserved to be where you were
The grind is a pain in the balls though.
It can be, I don't know I've never had trouble climbing
You are silver. You have many, many, many troubles climbing, and that is quite apparent.

The biggest thing stopping me from climbing is legitimately my extremely inconsistent and unreliable internet connection. 100% serious. So while yes, there might be some issues, I'm sure there are, they aren't internal
I went 4-6 and ended up plat 2 (from diamond 5). I think everything went much better than anticipated.
LOL, its only the bronze/silver kids complaining, everyone plat+ whos been dropped 1 or 2 tiers knows they will get back to where they were before eventually
